Articles.Content: The body begins to wake, "xanarri, what do you mean?"

The end of the First War....... 

To be continued.......

- - - Updated - - -

We must try to bring her back.............

- - - Updated - - -

Is anyone on?

The citadel 2.0 is completed, and the galaxy is at peace.

Also, I think we should rename the galaxy the Doughnut Galaxy because of the missing bit in the middle.

The Donut Way!

- - - Updated - - -

The USS Discovery II is now complete, with even more advanced weaponry and shields. Now with a 100% Kinemet hull and the Kraken Drive 9.0

Also,do not forget that we still have my court martial to deal with...the admirals in charge of it were kind enough to give me time to recover from my injuries (you know, that self-inflicted head wound)
I think the first quarter of the next section, my character will be act less as a ship captain and more as a diplomat. And i will be in a wheelchair.
A floating wheelchair
A floating laser wheel chair with holograms and pie dispensers.

> 
> A floating laser wheel chair with holograms and pie dispensers.

Lol, yeah, you know what, ithink that this game is probably stumping the admins given that it suddenly turned into a full blown story...
Yeah.
How do I place files into replies?
Not sure exactly, try putting the stuff in an outside download source and post the download link?

Here's our galaxy map. Talk to me if you want your territory added.

Lol, my territory rubs right against xannari's territory. No WONDER we were always fighting!
Seemed good. Also the Citadel is a bit exposed

Btw, i suggest you also place the map on the op as well.

What do you thinK?
That is cool, hey, i was thinking, when we start this up again tommorrow, you should write a small prologue summarizing the preceding events of the previous war.
On it.
I have to laugh a,bit when thinking of how many times laythe want to take us to the multiverse and i outright refused, essentially saying, that i will go there, yes, ON MY OWN TERMS!
The majority of posts was yesterday and today.
Yeah, but it's nonetheless rather amusing...

There. Story so far posted.
